com.ge.dspmicro.storeforward.api

Interface IStoreForward


  • public interface IStoreForward
    Interface for StoreForward

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVICE_PID
      Service PID for StoreForward service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(IPersistable data)
      Add the data to the data store.
      int count()
      Fetches the count of rows in datastore.
      UUID getId()
      Get the unique ID for the store forward
      String getName()
      Get the unique name for the store forward
      IValidateRoute getValidateRoute()
      A ping functionality to verify the route of the data transfer.
      IPersistable peek()
      Get next data in the data store, but will not remove them from the data store.
      List<IPersistable> peek(int count)
      Get next specified number of data in the data store, but will not remove them from the data store.
      IPersistable poll()
      Get next data in the data store, and remove it from the data store.
      int remove(long persistenceId)
      Remove the data specified by the persistenceId.
      int removeAll()
      Remove all data from the data store.
      void setForwardCallback(IForwardCallback callback)
      Set a forward callback to the data store so that the forward thread will call.

    • Field Detail

      • SERVICE_PID

        static final String SERVICE_PID
        Service PID for StoreForward service
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        UUID getId()
        Get the unique ID for the store forward
        Returns:
        a unique ID

      • getName

        String getName()
        Get the unique name for the store forward
        Returns:
        a unique name

      • add

        void add(IPersistable data)
        Add the data to the data store.
        Parameters:
        data - data to be added

      • poll

        IPersistable poll()
        Get next data in the data store, and remove it from the data store.
        Returns:
        next data.

      • peek

        IPersistable peek()
        Get next data in the data store, but will not remove them from the data store.
        Returns:
        next data.

      • peek

        List<IPersistable> peek(int count)
        Get next specified number of data in the data store, but will not remove them from the data store.
        Parameters:
        count - number of data to retrieve.
        Returns:
        a list of next specified number of data.

      • count

        int count()
        Fetches the count of rows in datastore.
        Returns:
        number of rows in the main table.

      • remove

        int remove(long persistenceId)
        Remove the data specified by the persistenceId.
        Parameters:
        persistenceId - data id to be removed
        Returns:
        number of rows removed in the main table.

      • removeAll

        int removeAll()
        Remove all data from the data store.
        Returns:
        number of rows removed in the main table

      • setForwardCallback

        void setForwardCallback(IForwardCallback callback)
        Set a forward callback to the data store so that the forward thread will call.
        Parameters:
        callback - callback to define the business logic to handle the data. To clear the callback, set the param to null.

      • getValidateRoute

        IValidateRoute getValidateRoute()
        A ping functionality to verify the route of the data transfer. If no ping is supported, returns null.
        Returns:
        a validate route instance
